article_text:
Skin care

An Editor-Approved At-Home Teeth Whitener

A year or two ago, I started noticing everyone’s teeth — and let me tell you, they were white. Out of nowhere, I would get taken aback by a sparkling set of ivory incisors I spotted on the street or find myself gawking at a coworker's perfect pearly whites during a meeting. It’s sounds weird (and a bit creepy), I ...

Megan Cahn

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Addison Cain
article_metadata.description: Skip the spa and go for a custom face-mask facial at home with this DIY beauty trick.

og.description: If your skin is anything like ours come wintertime, it develops a sassy new alter ego that is equal parts dry, oily, and sensitive. Unfortunately, our skin-care arsenals aren’t always equipped to deal with these seasonal changes. That’s where the DIY sheet mask comes in handy. From fighting
